projects.title: Sustinable Dairy Farming
projects.description: A project aimed at implementing sustainable farming practices to improve milk production while minimizing environmental impact.
projects.slogan: LETS SAVE PLANET ONE GLASS AT A TIME

projects.title: Ethical Farming
projects.description: A project aimed at implementing ethical and humane farming practices to improve life quality of our beloved farm animals while maintaining milk production and minimizing environmental impact.

projects.title: Lactose Free Dairy Product
projects.description: A project aimed at creating line of lactose free dairy products to serve our lactose intolerant customers so they too can enjoy the goodness of dairy.
